meanings.sent1: The local mayor was known as a strong federalist, always advocating for more power to be given to the central government.
meanings.sent2: Many federalists believe in a system where power is shared between the national and state governments.
meanings.sent3: The federalist squirrel in the park was always gathering nuts for the whole community.
meanings.sent4: She was a true federalist, weaving together different ideas to create a stronger whole.
meanings.sent5: The federalist bee colony worked together harmoniously for the greater good.

meanings.definition: A member or supporter of the Federalist Party.
meanings.sent1: The Federalist Party gained support from many federalists who believed in a strong central government.
meanings.sent2: As a federalist, he proudly displayed the party's emblem on his car.
meanings.sent3: The Federalist Party picnic was a hit, with all the federalists enjoying the food and games.
meanings.sent4: She dressed up as a Federalist Party member for Halloween, complete with a tricorn hat.
meanings.sent5: The Federalist Party meeting was filled with passionate speeches from dedicated federalists.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of federalism.
meanings.sent1: The federalist principles aim to balance power between the national and state governments.
meanings.sent2: The federalist approach to governance emphasizes cooperation between different levels of authority.
meanings.sent3: The federalist ducks in the pond took turns leading the group, showing a true spirit of collaboration.
meanings.sent4: Her federalist mindset allowed her to see the benefits of working together for common goals.
meanings.sent5: The federalist system of government ensures that decisions are made with input from various regions.
